    • Method Detail

      • addEventListener

        public void addEventListener(Attendant.AttendantEventListener ev)
        Adds an event listener to the list of registered event listeners for the Attendant class
        Parameters:
        ev - indicates the method called by the API when an Attendant event occurs
        See Also:
        Attendant.AttendantEventListener

      • block

        public void block(long reasonCode)
           throws EnablerException
        Blocks the attendant from further transactions until unblocked
        Parameters:
        reasonCode - Reason for the attendant being blocked

        Note :
        A reason of 0 means attendant is not blocked.

        Throws:
        EnablerException - if the operation fails

                        throws EnablerException

        public int getBlockReason()
        Returns:
        Reason for the attendant being blocked

      • getCurrentPeriodID

        public int getCurrentPeriodID()
        Returns:
        Returns the current PeriodID of the attendant

        Note : Returns 0 if no period is open

      • getLogOnID

        public java.lang.String getLogOnID()
        Returns:
        Logonid (or username) of the Attendant.
